Q: How can you widen a column in Excel to show all the data?
Choices: a: Right-click column, select Format Cells, then Best-Fit | b: Double-click column | c: Right-click column, select Best-Fit | d: Double-click the vertical boundary between columns

Q: Which functions check for the presence of numerical or nonnumerical characters in cells?
Choices: a: ISNUMBER and ISTEXT | b: ISNUMBER and ISALPHA | c: ISVALUE and ISNUMBER | d: ISVALUE and ISTEXT

Q: What contents will appear in cells A3, A4, and A5 when dragging the fill handle of cell A2 downward?
Choices: a: Jan, Jan, Jan | b: Feb, Mar, blank cell | c: Feb, Mar, Apr | d: FEB, MAB, APR

Q: If cell A3 contains 'THE DEATH OF CHIVALRY', what will the function =PROPER(A3) return?
Choices: a: the death of chivalry | b: The death of Chivalry | c: THE DEATH OF CHIVALRY | d: The Death Of Chivalry

Q: Before using Data > Subtotal, what must you do?
Choices: a: Sort by the data in Column E | b: Format the data in Column D | c: Sort by the data in Column D | d: Format the data in Column E

Q: When editing a cell, how do you cycle between relative, mixed, and absolute cell references?
Choices: a: Alt+F4 (Windows) or Option+F4 (Mac) | b: Alt+Shift+4 (Windows) or Option+Shift+4 (Mac) | c: Ctrl+Shift+4 (Windows) or Command+Shift+4 (Mac) | d: F4 (Windows) or Command+T (Mac)

Q: How can you add a line chart showing sales trends in a single cell?
Choices: a: Add an image to a comment | b: Add a hyperlink to another worksheet | c: Add an image to the worksheet | d: Add a sparkline

Q: What is the best way to activate Excel Help system?
Choices: a: Right-click anywhere and select Help | b: Press F1 or click the Help tab in the ribbon | c: Press F10 | d: All of these answers

Q: Which format will display the value 27,500,000 as 27.5?
When using Goal Seek, how many inputs can you vary to find a target result?
Choices: a: three inputs | b: four inputs | c: two inputs | d: one input
